00041 /// struct for holding isotope information
00042 struct PWIZ_API_DECL MassAbundance
00043 {
00044     double mass;
00045     double abundance;
00046 
00047     MassAbundance(double m = 0, double a = 0)
00048     :   mass(m), abundance(a)
00049     {}
00050 
00051     bool operator==(const MassAbundance& that) const;
00052     bool operator!=(const MassAbundance& that) const;
00053 };
00054 
00055 
00056 /// struct for holding isotope distribution
00057 typedef std::vector<MassAbundance> MassDistribution;
00058 
00059 
00060 PWIZ_API_DECL std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const MassAbundance& ma);
00061 PWIZ_API_DECL std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const MassDistribution& md);

00064 /// scope for declarations related to elements
00065 namespace Element {

00067 
00068 /// enumeration of the elements
00069 enum PWIZ_API_DECL Type
00070 {
00071     H, He, Li, Be, B, C, N, O, F, Ne, 
00072     Na, Mg, Al, Si, P, S, Cl, Ar, K, Ca, 
00073     Sc, Ti, V, Cr, Mn, Fe, Co, Ni, Cu, Zn, 
00074     Ga, Ge, As, Se, Br, Kr, Rb, Sr, Y, Zr, 
00075     Nb, Mo, Tc, Ru, Rh, Pd, Ag, Cd, In, Sn, 
00076     Sb, Te, I, Xe, Cs, Ba, La, Ce, Pr, Nd, 
00077     Pm, Sm, Eu, Gd, Tb, Dy, Ho, Er, Tm, Yb, 
00078     Lu, Hf, Ta, W, Re, Os, Ir, Pt, Au, Hg, 
00079     Tl, Pb, Bi, Po, At, Rn, Fr, Ra, Ac, Th, 
00080     Pa, U, Np, Pu, Am, Cm, Bk, Cf, Es, Fm, 
00081     Md, No, Lr, Rf, Db, Sg, Bh, Hs, Mt, Uun, 
00082     Uuu, Uub, Uuq, Uuh
00083 };
00084 
00085 
00086 PWIZ_API_DECL std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, Type type);

00089 /// class for obtaining information about elements
00090 class PWIZ_API_DECL Info
00091 {
00092     public:
00093 
00094     Info();
00095     ~Info();
00096 
00097     /// structure for holding info about an element
00098     struct Record
00099     {
00100         Type type;
00101         std::string symbol;
00102         int atomicNumber;
00103         double atomicWeight;
00104         MassDistribution isotopes;
00105     };
00106 
00107     /// retrieve the record for an element
00108     const Record& operator[](Type type) const;
00109 
00110     private:
00111 
00112     /// hidden implementation
00113     class Impl;
00114     std::auto_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00115 
00116     // don't allow copying
00117     Info(const Info&);
00118     const Info& operator=(const Info&);
00119 };
00120 
00121 
00122 PWIZ_API_DECL std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Info::Record& record);
00123 
00124 
00125 } // namespace Element

00128 /// class to represent a chemical formula
00129 class PWIZ_API_DECL Formula
00130 {
00131     public:
00132 
00133     /// formula string given by symbol/count pairs, e.g. water: "H2 O1" (whitespace optional)  
00134     Formula(const std::string& formula = "");
00135     Formula(const Formula& formula);
00136     const Formula& operator=(const Formula& formula);
00137     ~Formula();
00138 
00139     double monoisotopicMass() const;
00140     double molecularWeight() const;
00141     std::string formula() const;
00142 
00143     /// access to the Element's count in the formula
00144     int operator[](Element::Type e) const;
00145     int& operator[](Element::Type e);
00146 
00147     // direct access to the map, for iteration
00148     typedef std::map<Element::Type, int> Map;
00149     const Map& data() const;
00150 
00151     // operations
00152     Formula& operator+=(const Formula& that);    
00153     Formula& operator-=(const Formula& that);    
00154     Formula& operator*=(int scalar);
00155     
00156     private:
00157     class Impl;
00158     std::auto_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00159 };
00160 
00161 
00162 PWIZ_API_DECL Formula operator+(const Formula& a, const Formula& b);
00163 PWIZ_API_DECL Formula operator-(const Formula& a, const Formula& b);
00164 PWIZ_API_DECL Formula operator*(const Formula& a, int scalar);
00165 PWIZ_API_DECL Formula operator*(int scalar, const Formula& a);
00166 
00167 
00168 /// output a Formula
00169 PWIZ_API_DECL std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Formula& formula);
